fr.aureliancnx.betterbungee.api

Interface IBetterBungeeAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BetterBungeeAPI

    public interface IBetterBungeeAPI

      Retrieves the number of players currently connected to a minecraft server instance over the network by the server info even if they are all in separate proxies in the current cluster.
      long getPlayerCountOnServer(java.lang.String serverName)
      Retrieves the number of players currently connected to a minecraft server instance over the network, by using its server name, even if they are all in separate proxies in the current cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableBungees

        java.util.Collection<IBungeeServer> getAvailableBungees()
        Get a collection of current available bungees. Bungee servers objects are meant to be used for read-only purposes. Bungee considered as available are proxies online and plugged into the network.
        Returns:
        all available bungees

      • getPlayerCountOnBungee

        long getPlayerCountOnBungee(java.lang.String bungeeName)
        Get current online player count on a bungee server
        Parameters:
        bungeeName - bungee name (internal name)
        Returns:
        number of players. If bungee is not existant, -1 is returned.

      • getPlayers

        java.util.Collection<IBetterPlayer> getPlayers()
        Get list of all online players, all over the network. Be aware of not using this function when you don't need it, as it concatenates all online player lists online on available proxies.
        Returns:
        a collection of IBetterPlayer

      • getPlayerCount

        long getPlayerCount()
        Get count of current online players logged accross the network server.
        Returns:
        current player count (long)

      • getPlayer

        IBetterPlayer getPlayer(net.md_5.bungee.api.connection.ProxiedPlayer proxiedPlayer)
        Get an instance of IBetterPlayer from a ProxiedPlayer (bungeecord implementation of player object). This instance is read-only, and therefore, cannot be used to change player data. Passing a null proxiedPlayer would return an assert exception, please check your input. If player is not found and/or offline, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        proxiedPlayer - bungeecord player
        Returns:
        IBetterPlayer instance

      • getPlayer

        IBetterPlayer getPlayer(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Get an instance of IBetterPlayer from player's unique id This instance is read-only, and therefore, cannot be used to change player data. Passing a null UUID would return an assert exception, please check your input. If player is not found and/or offline, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        uuid - player's UUID in Mojang implementation
        Returns:
        IBetterPlayer instance

      • getPlayer

        IBetterPlayer getPlayer(java.lang.String username)
        Get an instance of IBetterPlayer from player's username This instance is read-only, and therefore, cannot be used to change player data. Passing a null username would return an assert exception, please check your input. If player is not found and/or offline, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        username - player name
        Returns:
        IBetterPlayer instance

      • isPlayerOnline

        boolean isPlayerOnline(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Retrieves if a player is online or not over the network by using its unique id.
        Parameters:
        uuid - player's unique id
        Returns:
        true if online, false otherwise.

      • isPlayerOnline

        boolean isPlayerOnline(java.lang.String username)
        Retrieves if a player is online or not over the network by using its username.
        Parameters:
        username - player's username
        Returns:
        true if online, false otherwise.

      • getPlayerUsername

        java.lang.String getPlayerUsername(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Lookup player username from its unique id. Beware that lookup player username is requiring player to be online over the network, not necessarily onto this bungee. If player is not online or player's username cannot be retrieved from the unique id, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        uuid - player's unique id
        Returns:
        username, or null if not found

      • getPlayerUniqueId

        java.util.UUID getPlayerUniqueId(java.lang.String username)
        Lookup player's unique id from its username. Beware that lookup player UUID is requiring player to be online over the network, not necessarily onto this bungee. If player is not online or player's unique id cannot be retrieved from the username, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        username - player's username
        Returns:
        username, or null if not found

      • getServerFor

        net.md_5.bungee.api.config.ServerInfo getServerFor(net.md_5.bungee.api.connection.ProxiedPlayer proxiedPlayer)
        Lookup the minecraft server where player is connected to by using its ProxiedPlayer reference. Beware that, if player is not online or not found, null is returned. Even if the player server's name is retrieved, if this one is not registered in the current bungee server, null is returned. You might want to get player server's name directly from
        Parameters:
        proxiedPlayer - online player
        Returns:
        ServerInfo where the player is online
        See Also:
        getPlayer(ProxiedPlayer)

      • getServerFor

        net.md_5.bungee.api.config.ServerInfo getServerFor(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Lookup the minecraft server where player is connected to by using its unique id. Beware that, if player is not online or not found, null is returned. Even if the player server's name is retrieved, if this one is not registered in the current bungee server, null is returned. You might want to get player server's name directly from
        Parameters:
        uuid - unique id
        Returns:
        ServerInfo where the player is online
        See Also:
        getPlayer(UUID)

      • getServerFor

        net.md_5.bungee.api.config.ServerInfo getServerFor(java.lang.String username)
        Lookup the minecraft server where player is connected to by using its username. Beware that, if player is not online or not found, null is returned. Even if the player server's name is retrieved, if this one is not registered in the current bungee server, null is returned. You might want to get player server's name directly from
        Parameters:
        username - player's username
        Returns:
        ServerInfo where the player is online
        See Also:
        getPlayer(String)

      • getPlayerCountOnServer

        long getPlayerCountOnServer(net.md_5.bungee.api.config.ServerInfo server)
        Retrieves the number of players currently connected to a minecraft server instance over the network by the server info even if they are all in separate proxies in the current cluster. If the ServerInfo object is null, -1 is returned. If nobody is connected to the requested server name, 0 is returned.
        Parameters:
        server - ServerInfo, the object that references the so-called minecraft instance in BungeeCord.
        Returns:
        count of online players

      • getPlayerCountOnServer

        long getPlayerCountOnServer(java.lang.String serverName)
        Retrieves the number of players currently connected to a minecraft server instance over the network, by using its server name, even if they are all in separate proxies in the current cluster. If the server name cannot be retrieved, -1 is returned. If nobody is connected to the requested server name, 0 is returned.
        Parameters:
        serverName - server name as it's registered in the bungee server.
        Returns:
        count of online players
